description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Windows graphics component:

1. Apply the relevant KB Article updates depending on your Windows version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2, apply KB5043080.
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2, apply KB5043076.
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2, apply KB5043064.
   - For other versions of Windows 10 or 11, refer to the provided update packages.

2. Ensure to download the updates using the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
3. Restart the system after installation to complete the update process.

**Details**:
- This update addresses a specific graphics component vulnerability that could allow unauthorized privilege escalation within the system.
- For manual installations, download the update package from: 
   - [KB5043080](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043080)
   - [KB5043076](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043076)
   - [KB5043064](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043064)
   - Additional updates can be found through the respective KB articles for different Windows builds. 

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that the system is updated to one of the specified builds mentioned above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
